headline.print_headline: NY Mayor Called Police Boss About Arrested Pastor
headline.main: NY Mayor Called Police Boss About Arrested Pastor

lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio called the commanding officer of the police department's press office to ask about the arrest of a politically connected pastor who endorsed him and served as a member of his transition team, but the pastor had already been released, police and administration officials said Tuesday,
